label: WGS
description: Whole Genome Sequencing - random sequencing of the whole genome (see pubmed 10731132 for details)

label: WGA
description: Whole Genome Amplification followed by random sequencing. (see pubmed 1631067,8962113 for details)

label: WXS
description: Random sequencing of exonic regions selected from the genome. (see pubmed 20111037 for details)

label: RNA-Seq
description: Random sequencing of whole transcriptome, also known as Whole Transcriptome Shotgun Sequencing, or WTSS). (see pubmed 18611170 for details)

label: ssRNA-seq
description: Strand-specific RNA sequencing.

label: miRNA-Seq
description: Micro RNA sequencing strategy designed to capture post-transcriptional RNA elements and include non-coding functional elements. (see pubmed 21787409 for details)

label: ncRNA-Seq
description: Capture of other non-coding RNA types, including post-translation modification types such as snRNA (small nuclear RNA) or snoRNA (small nucleolar RNA), or expression regulation types such as siRNA (small interfering RNA) or piRNA/piwi/RNA (piwi-interacting RNA).

label: FL-cDNA
description: Full-length sequencing of cDNA templates

label: EST
description: Single pass sequencing of cDNA templates

label: Hi-C
description: Chromosome Conformation Capture technique where a biotin-labeled nucleotide is incorporated at the ligation junction, enabling selective purification of chimeric DNA ligation junctions followed by deep sequencing.

label: ATAC-seq
description: Assay for Transposase-Accessible Chromatin (ATAC) strategy is used to study genome-wide chromatin accessibility. alternative method to DNase-seq that uses an engineered Tn5 transposase to cleave DNA and to integrate primer DNA sequences into the cleaved genomic DNA.

label: WCS
description: Random sequencing of a whole chromosome or other replicon isolated from a genome.

label: RAD-Seq
description: N/A

label: CLONE
description: Genomic clone based (hierarchical) sequencing.

label: POOLCLONE
description: Shotgun of pooled clones (usually BACs and Fosmids).

label: AMPLICON
description: Sequencing of overlapping or distinct PCR or RT-PCR products. For example, metagenomic community profiling using SSU rRNA.

label: CLONEEND
description: Clone end (5’, 3’, or both) sequencing.

label: FINISHING
description: Sequencing intended to finish (close) gaps in existing coverage.

label: ChIP-Seq
description: ChIP-seq, Chromatin ImmunoPrecipitation, reveals binding sites of specific proteins, typically transcription factors (TFs) using antibodies to extract DNA fragments bound to the target protein.

label: MNase-Seq
description: Identifies well-positioned nucleosomes. uses Micrococcal Nuclease (MNase) is an endo-exonuclease that processively digests DNA until an obstruction, such as a nucleosome, is reached.

label: DNase-Hypersensitivity
description: Sequencing of hypersensitive sites, or segments of open chromatin that are more readily cleaved by DNaseI.

label: Bisulfite-Seq
description: MethylC-seq. Sequencing following treatment of DNA with bisulfite to convert cytosine residues to uracil depending on methylation status.

label: CTS
description: Concatenated Tag Sequencing

label: MRE-Seq
description: Methylation-Sensitive Restriction Enzyme Sequencing.

label: MeDIP-Seq
description: Methylated DNA Immunoprecipitation Sequencing.

label: MBD-Seq
description: Methyl CpG Binding Domain Sequencing.

label: Tn-Seq
description: Quantitatively determine fitness of bacterial genes based on how many times a purposely seeded transposon gets inserted into each gene of a colony after some time.

label: VALIDATION
description: CGHub special request

label: FAIRE-seq
description: Formaldehyde Assisted Isolation of Regulatory Elements. Reveals regions of open chromatin.

label: SELEX
description: Systematic Evolution of Ligands by Exponential enrichment

label: RIP-Seq
description: Direct sequencing of RNA immunoprecipitates (includes CLIP-Seq, HITS-CLIP and PAR-CLIP).

label: ChIA-PET
description: Direct sequencing of proximity-ligated chromatin immunoprecipitates.

label: Synthetic-Long-Read
description: binning and barcoding of large DNA fragments to facilitate assembly of the fragment

label: Targeted-Capture
description: Enrichment of a targeted subset of loci.

label: Tethered Chromatin Conformation Capture
description: N/A

label: OTHER
description: Library strategy not listed.
